title: Giant 'sand battery' holds a week's heat for a whole town
excerpt: A new industrial-scale 'sand battery' has been announced for Finland, which packs 1 MW of power and a capacity of up to 100 MWh of thermal energy for use during those cold polar winters. The new battery will be about 10 times bigger than a pilot plant thatâ€™s been running since 2022.
